channel.title: How do i add Staff Crowns to a 317 Delta Server
channel.description: Exactly what the title says. I tried searching and got nothing. And also, when i make a new account im in lumbridge, but when i press the home button i go to edgeville, how do i make it so im always in lumbridge?

item.title: How do i add Staff Crowns to a 317 Delta Server
item.dc:creator: @NathanS95 NathanS95
item.description:
@NathanS95 wrote:

Got to the source folder search Clickingbuttons.java, open that file, search “home”
this should show

//home teleports
case 4171:
case 50056:
c.getPA().movePlayer(2035, 4529, 0);
break;

Change the (2035, 4529, 0) to (3222, 3218, 0) save, compile, then re-run the server and try the home teleport, any problems pm me.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add Staff Crowns to a 317 Delta Server
